title: Hair One Cleanser and Conditioner with Olive Oil for Dry Hair 12 oz
description: Hair One Hair Cleanser Conditioner is a salon quality sulfate-free product that leaves hair cleansed, conditioned and in optimum shape.

title: derma e Very Clear Problem Skin Moisturizer, 2-Ounce (56g) (Pack of 2)
description: No animal testing. Derma e Clear Skin 3 Problem Skin Moisturizer is a daily moisturizer that provides a proper balance between moisture and oil, thus preventing clogged pores and bacterial infection while hydrating the skin. Our moisturizer utilizes a special blend of natural ingredients (Tea Tree, Willow Bark, Rosewood, Lavender and Chamomile) that has been shown to be very effective on blemish-prone skin. Excellent for either oily or dry skin types, and will not leave a residue or irritate the skin. Made in USA.

title: Buffering Lotion
description: Specifically designed to treat large, deep, cystic acne, the buffering lotion covers large erupted areas for overall treatment. Formulated with nourishing B vitamins and amino acids for healthy skin as well as soothing anti-inflammatory herbal extracts to promote healing. Reduce cystic acne fast with this deep penetrating, fast absorbing formula.
